subject: Football
Social Networking (Internet)
lead_paragraph: As N.F.L. training camps opened last week, players were told that the same standard — read: paranoia — that applies to the flow of information to reporters also applies to Twitter.
snippet: As N.F.L. training camps opened last week, players were told that the same standard — read: paranoia — that applies to the flow of information to reporters also applies to Twitter.
